name: Cubium Dreams
description: Cubium Dreams - is an atmospheric first-person puzzle game with horror elements, made in a minimalistic surreal style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: dual core 1.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb video memory Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: At a more slower computers game has not been tested.  Maybe it works well and on very old systems, as resource consumption is very small.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: dual core 3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 mb video memory Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: good little indie game with some originality.  needs some better options so one can change things like mouse config.  The player characters 'movement' could be improved too.

great walking sim, truly a quality indie game that I would recommend, definitely on sale though. Kind of confusing but was interesting and unique if youre into the sort of crazy surreal walking simulator.
